com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Interface WComponentTreeVisitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractVisitorWithResult, FindComponentByIdVisitor, FindComponentsByClassVisitor, TreeUtil.AbstractTreeVisitorWithResult

    public interface WComponentTreeVisitor
    A visitor interface used when traversing WComponent trees.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  WComponentTreeVisitor.VisitorResult
      An enumeration used to short-circuit tree traversal for efficiency.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WComponentTreeVisitor.VisitorResult visit(WComponent comp)
      Called for each component in the WComponent hierarchy.

    • Method Detail

      • visit

        WComponentTreeVisitor.VisitorResult visit(WComponent comp)
        Called for each component in the WComponent hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        comp - the component in the tree being observed
        Returns:
        how the traversal should proceed.
